name: Polarity - Master both poles of the same magnet
name_original: Polarity - Master both poles of the same magnet
description:
Have you ever dreamed of controlling the both poles of the same magnet separately?! Now you have the power to master the Polarity!

Join the hypnotizing journey of co-dependence in Polarity. The rules are simple! Control the two opposed poles in sync. Survive against all odds and keep polar.

Features:

◉ Minimalist design;

◉ Colorful backgrounds;

◉ Beautifully crafted soundtrack;

◉ Simple to play, difficult to master;

Say hello@novogames.co.uk we’d love to hear from you!
